column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The Lou which I had last time wasn't great
column2: but I had with crustless and personal size
column3: so I was hoping this time was better
column4: but no. It was the same. I didn't like it. On the other hand
column5: The Malnati Chicago Classis tasted good which was good surprise. I wish I knew that at the first time. It had chunk of tomatoes and very flavorful.
